analysis.raw_analysis:
1) TRANSFORMATION: Output keeps same dimensions (16x11) — purely recoloring of some objects; size ratio 1:1.

2) PATTERN: Among the six identical-size objects, two objects that are shape-wise distinct from the majority are recolored: one is changed to color 8 and another to color 3; all other object pixels remain color 2.

3) KEY CHANGES:
- Example1: two objects 2->8 (top-left, middle-left region), one object 2->3 (middle-right); others remain 2.
- Example2: two objects 2->8 (top-right, middle-left), one object 2->3 (bottom-right); others remain 2.
- Example3: two objects 2->8 (top-right, middle-right), one object 2->3 (top-left); others remain 2.

=== INPUT-INPUT COMPARISONS ===
- Same: 11x16 grid, six objects in fixed 3x2 layout, all objects colored 2, background 0, object sizes identical.
- Diff: shapes/orientations of two objects differ from the other four in each input.

=== OUTPUT-OUTPUT COMPARISONS ===
- Exactly the same: background 0 unchanged; four objects remain color 2; two objects are recolored to 8 and 3 (no other colors introduced).

=== INPUT-OUTPUT COMPARISONS ===
- Rule: identify the two shape-wise distinct objects among the six and recolor them (one -> 8, the other -> 3); leave the other four as 2.

REFERENCE OBJECTS:
The six objects are in a fixed 3x2 layout. Use object shape identity (connected region pattern), not position, as the reference.

GRID PATTERNS:
Always recolor some objects while keeping dimensions/background. Find shape-frequency across the six: one shape occurs twice, one occurs once, the rest share the original color.

OBJECTS:
Rule that fits all: recolor the shape that appears exactly twice to color 8, recolor the shape that appears exactly once to color 3, leave all remaining (majority) objects as color 2.

=== GENERAL RULE ===
1. Leave the canvas size and the background (color 0) unchanged; the transformation only recolors whole object connected components.  
2. Consider the six non-background connected components (all initially color 2) as objects and group them by their connected-pixel pattern (shape), i.e. objects are compared by their exact connected-pattern regardless of where they sit on the grid.  
3. Count how many times each distinct shape occurs among the six objects.  
4. For the shape that occurs exactly twice, recolor every pixel of those object(s) from 2 to 8.  
5. For the shape that occurs exactly once, recolor every pixel of that single object from 2 to 3.  
6. Leave all pixels of any remaining shape(s) (the shape(s) that occur more than once and are not the 2-occurrence shape) at color 2.  
7. Do not change any other pixels or introduce any new colors: the output uses only colors 0, 2, 8, and 3, and only whole connected objects are recolored according to the frequency rule above.

general_steps.instruction: Step 1: Identify the six non-background connected components (objects). Consider as objects only connected regions composed entirely of color 2. Compare objects by their exact connected-pixel pattern (shape) allowing translation — i.e., two objects are the same shape if their binary mask patterns are identical when shifted, independent of location.
general_steps.condition: Any connected component (4-connected) composed only of color 2 and not color 0 (background). Group these components by exact shape (pattern of occupied cells, translation-invariant).

general_steps.instruction: Step 2: Recolor every object that belongs to the shape-group whose group size is exactly 2 (i.e., the shape pattern appears in exactly two of the six objects) to color 8. Recolor the entire connected component(s) (every pixel of those objects). Do not alter background or any other objects.
general_steps.condition: Objects that are in a shape-group with count == 2 and originally composed only of color 2.

general_steps.instruction: Step 3: Recolor the object that belongs to the shape-group whose group size is exactly 1 (i.e., a unique shape pattern among the six) to color 3. Recolor the entire connected component (every pixel of that object). Leave all other objects and the background unchanged.
general_steps.condition: Object that is in a shape-group with count == 1 and originally composed only of color 2.
